derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from French côtelette, earlier costelette, diminutive of coste 'rib', from Latin costa

entry.tran: (通常用来炸或烤的)肉片，肉排
entry.def: A cutlet is a small piece of meat which is usually fried or grilled.

means.word_mean: 1. thin slice of meat (especially veal) usually fried or broiled
